<h3 id="X10072">X(10072)&nbsp;=&nbsp;ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: OUTER-YFF TO ARTZT</h3>
Trilinears &nbsp;&nbsp; (S - (b + c)p)/a + 2p : : , where p = rR/(R - r)
<br>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^4-2*(b^2+c^2-3*b*c)*a^2+(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :
<p><b>
X(10072) = R*X(1)-r*X(2)
</b></p>
<p>X(10072) lies on these lines:{1,2}, {3,3058}, {4,4317}, {5,3304}, {7,3065}, {11,381}, {12,5055}, {20,4857}, {30,56}, {35,1058}, {36,376}, {55,549}, {65,3656}, {80,3476}, {115,10054}, {140,3303}, {278,1784}, {345,4975}, {348,7264}, {354,912}, {388,3545}, {390,5010}, {474,3813}, {484,5435}, {495,547}, {524,613}, {528,2932}, {539,10071}, {542,10069}, {543,10070}, {546,9657}, {550,9670}, {553,946}, {597,611}, {631,3746}, {920,3928}, {956,3816}, {962,3336}, {982,1725}, {1015,5309}, {1056,5071}, {1387,2099}, {1440,7271}, {1470,10058}, {1770,3361}, {1788,5697}, {1836,7743}, {1997,3992}, {2242,7753}, {2275,7739}, {2478,8666}, {2551,5288}, {2646,3653}, {2800,5603}, {3027,8724}, {3028,5655}, {3057,3654}, {3091,5270}, {3146,4325}, {3295,4995}, {3297,9661}, {3333,4654}, {3337,4295}, {3436,3825}, {3487,5443}, {3522,4330}, {3534,6284}, {3543,3583}, {3585,3600}, {3627,9671}, {3655,5722}, {3830,7354}, {3850,9656}, {3911,5119}, {4294,5265}, {4301,6890}, {5084,5258}, {5131,9778}, {5204,8703}, {5432,6767}, {5459,10062}, {5460,10061}, {5687,6691}, {5734,6972}, {5860,10049}, {5861,10048}, {5881,6944}, {5882,6834}, {6055,10053}, {6824,9624}, {6891,7982}, {6921,8715}, {6926,7991}, {7173,9654}, {7811,10047}, {9466,10063}, {9909,10046}</p>
<p>
X(10072) = X(2)-of-outer-Yff-triangle<br>
X(10072) = X(381)-of-2nd Johnson-Yff triangle<br>
X(10072) = inner-Johnson-to-ABC similarity image of X(381)<br>
X(10072) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1,2,10056), (1,499,498), (1,3086,499), (1,3582,2), (2,3086,3582), (2,3582,499), (2,10056,498), (4,5563,4317), (11,999,1478), (11,5434,381), (36,497,4302), (56,496,1479), (56,1479,4299), (381,999,5434), (381,5434,1478), (499,10056,2), (1058,7288,35), (3058,5298,3), (3295,5054,4995), (3361,9614,1770), (4293,5274,3583), (4294,5265,7280), (4995,5433,5054), (12951,12952,12589)<br>
</p>
